meta.description: Compare the top national universities in the U.S. Learn more about the best national universities to find the right school for you.
meta.og:title: The Best National Universities in America
meta.og:description: See how the top national universities rank at US News. Find rankings for the best national universities in the US.

toggle.heading: Here are the best colleges in the U.S.

hero.title: Best National University Rankings
hero.description: Schools in the National Universities category, such as the University of Chicago and Carnegie Mellon University, offer a full range of undergraduate majors, plus master's and doctoral programs. These colleges also are committed to producing groundbreaking research.
hero.subtitle: Here are the best colleges in the U.S.

items.blurb: Founded in 1837, Marshall University is a public institution. Marshall University follows a semester-based academic calendar and its admissions are considered selective.

Founded in 1911, Middle Tennessee State University is a public institution. The school has 59.9% of its classes with fewer than 20 students, and the student-faculty ratio at Middle Tennessee State University is 17:1.

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: Founded in 1899, Northern Arizona University is a public institution. Northern Arizona University offers a Greek system, where 8 percent of the student body is involved in a sorority and 11% is involved in a fraternity.

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: Portland State University is a public school in the Oregon University System. The campus is located in downtown Portland, where students can live in university housing.

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: Founded in 1881, South Dakota State University is a public institution. The school has 30% of its classes with fewer than 20 students, and the student-faculty ratio at South Dakota State University is 17:1.

institution.aliasNames: UH Hilo University of Hawaii Hilo

items.blurb: Founded in 1947, University of Hawaii at Hilo is a public institution.

institution.footnote: This school declined to fill out the U.S. News & World Report main statistical survey. Data that appears is from either what the school reported in previous years or from another source, such as the National Center for Education Statistics.
institution.aliasNames: University of Puerto Rico Rio Piedras

acceptanceRate.noteText: Data reported to U.S. News in previous years

items.blurb: Founded in 1903, University of Puerto Rico--Rio Piedras is a public institution. University of Puerto Rico--Rio Piedras follows a semester-based academic calendar and its admissions are considered less selective.

institution.aliasNames: UT Arlington University of Texas Arlington

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: Founded in 1895, University of Texas at Arlington is a public institution. The school has 29.1% of its classes with fewer than 20 students, and the student-faculty ratio at University of Texas at Arlington is 24:1.

acceptanceRate.noteText: Data reported to U.S. News in previous years

items.blurb: Founded in 1969, Alliant International University is a proprietary institution.

institution.footnote: This school declined to fill out the U.S. News & World Report main statistical survey. Data that appears is from either what the school reported in previous years or from another source, such as the National Center for Education Statistics.

acceptanceRate.noteText: Data reported to U.S. News in previous years

satAvg.noteText: Previous year's data was used in the ranking calculation.

actAvg.noteText: Previous year's data was used in the ranking calculation.

items.blurb: Founded in 1874, Andrews University is a private institution. Andrews University follows a semester-based academic calendar and its admissions are considered more selective.

utag_data.stitial_fact: Upward of 304,000 Chinese students studied in the U.S. during the 2014-2015 academic year.
